Moreover, protecting Charadrius hiaticula and its habitats can provide additional benefits. For instance, their habitats, like beaches, can provide ecosystem services such as erosion control, water filtration, and tourism opportunities, which can have wider socio-economic benefits.

Finally, preserving the habitats of Charadrius hiaticula and other species is an ethical responsibility.
